Author: glx#4214
Content: Guys I am struggling with the Agama wallet. There does not seem to be a way to create and sign transactions totally offline and then execute them online completely protecting your private key or seed.  Everything in the tools section is in beta.  Does anyone know of a way to do this?

Author: glx#4214
Content: Yes if other Komodo tokens like GLXT or Zilla get send to your Ledger KMD address they will be in the wallet but Ledger does not recognize them therefore they will not be visible. If you check the explorer they will be there.

Author: glx#4214
Content:
How is everyone doing?  I am going to be sending out the email below to every exchange in existence.  If anyone has any exchange relationships that can help us list we would appreciate the help. Also I am willing to pay a lot on some deep discounted pre-sale to kick off marketing if you have any investors?

GLX.com has created Polymath ST20 compliant tokens with the symbol ‚ÄúX‚Äù and ‚ÄúXA‚Äù for our current Series A $2 million raise. We have structured a Reg CF for U.S. citizens that will be listed on the StartEngine.com platform and a Reg S to reach offshore investors.

Following our Series A GLX will be doing a $25 million Tier II Reg A+ token offering as well. With the promotions we have lined up we feel GLX is going to be the hottest STO of the first half of this year.

We are looking for additional exchanges to list our offering and would like to work with you. Please fill out our listing survey here so we can get in touch - https://glx.co/sto

I look forward to hearing from you.

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: still the same GLX tokens as previously shortly available on barterdex?

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: What is sto price?

Author: glx#4214
Content: @Cryptoon No, GLXTs are our network tokens created on the GLX asset chain on the Komodo platform.  The current raise is being done with equity tokens created on the Polymath platform which is Ethereum backed.  The symbol is X for US citizens and and XA for those outside the US.  After we are funded and really launch the GLX platform we will focus on building membership and the GLXT token economy.

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: Why not use a kmd asset chain for the current raise?

Author: Cryptoon#3362

Author: glx#4214
Content: @Cryptoon Has anyone to date used a Komodo Chain to create a security token?  I do not think it would be easy to create the compliance features.

Author: glx#4214
Content: Our plan is to develop value to the GLXT Network Tokens and the GLX economy in the future. That said anyone holding GLXTs please sign up at GLX.com; go to your profile and under the tab "Contact Details" there is a section called "Add Crypto Address"; Please add your GLXT address where we can verify the amount of GLXTs held and also add your ETH address. Email us a note after you do this to x@glx.com and we will bonus transfer you the equiviliant dollar value of GLX Equity Tokens and you will also keep your GLXTs as well.

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: The issue was because of a high supply chain. A big utxo got moved to agama and it didnt want to move it back since agama could not handle big utxos of 500million or 1 billion coins

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: It seems like this issue has been resolved in native mode.

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: @SHossain

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: Similar issue has happened with other high supply chains of 10billion or more.

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: we advised GLX team to use native mode with huge amount of coin during the past year.

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: @siu - Chainmakers @jorian @glx GLXT electrum servers are not working. both servers are dead

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: ok

Author: Deleted User#0000
Content:
Hi here :).
Barterlly is now open on BETA mode, and will provide tools for users and CoinOwners to perform OTC trades in a safe way.
Any KMD assetchain dPowed will be listed, and supported, for free.
Other coins not already listed can submit a listing application at : https://barterlly.typeform.com/to/iqpS1H
During the BETA, Barterlly won't charge any fee other than the transaction ones. after the release we will charge 1% on top of every transaction.
Our goal is to provide premium tools for coins listed on the platform. (Discord swapbot, twitter integration, public orders, wallet integration, API, custom templating, and many more).
Feel free to join us on our Discord.
https://discord.gg/RHc95zw
The app link is located at : https://app.barterlly.io
We are open to suggestions, and partnerships.

See you soon !

Barterlly's team
